item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, September 16, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Datomic and Content Addressable Techniques (68 points | 16 comments)
3. A Spreadsheet and a Debugger Walk into a Shell (13 points | discuss)

10. GoGoGrandparent (YC S16) Is Hiring Back End and Full-Stack Engineers ( | hide)
11. D&D is Anti-Medieval (190 points | 242 comments)
12. TouchArcade Is Shutting Down (34 points | 12 comments)

14. Show HN: JAQT – JavaScript Queries and Transformations (71 points | 24 comments)

21. Plain Text Accounting (PTA) (271 points | 95 comments)

23. Oracle, it's time to free JavaScript (160 points | 68 comments)
24. The First HTML LSP That Reports Syntax Errors (200 points | 61 comments)
25. Ask HN: Does anyone use sound effects in their dev environment? (120 points | 189 comments)
26. How to Lead Your Team When the House Is on Fire (342 points | 174 comments)
27. The Waterfall Model was a straw man argument from the beginning (2015) (110 points | 128 comments)
28. Paraguay Loves Mickey, the Cartoon Mouse. Disney Doesn't (159 points | 97 comments)
29. Guile 3.0.10 now ships with support for parens-optional syntax (wisp) (12 points | 4 comments)
30. Bitcoin puzzle #66 was solved: 6.6 BTC (~$400k) withdrawn (404 points | 343 comments)
